text: Frank Joseph Bough (; 15 January 1933 â€“ 21 October 2020) was an English television presenter. He was best known as the former host of BBC sports and current affairs shows including Grandstand, Nationwide and Breakfast Time. Bough died on 21 October 2020 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English television presenters Category:Television news anchors Category:English sports commentators Category:English journalists Category:People from Staffordshire
